item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_ancient_emper: 魔像學 召喚一個陶土魔像軍隊
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_engraved_conc: 魔像學 召喚兩隻混凝土魔像
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_obsidian.name: 黑曜石頭顱戒指
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_obsidian.desc: 魔像學 召喚一個堅固的黑曜石魔像
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_sandstone.des: 魔像學 召喚五隻砂岩魔像
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_gaia.name: 大地之怒
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_gaia.desc: 當一個大地魔像被殺死，會有10%%的機會引發一次地震
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_grass.name: 草編戒指
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_grass.desc: 魔像學 召喚四隻稻草魔像
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_glistering.de: 魔像學 在戰鬥時總會召喚一隻西瓜魔像來治療你
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_forest_guardi: 魔像學 召喚兩隻木頭魔像和四隻樹葉魔像隨從
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_dried_mushro: 魔像學 召喚3隻蘑菇魔像來讓攻擊對象中毒
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_snare.name: 尖刺護身符
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_snare.desc: 魔像學 魔像被殺後會留下一個減速陷阱
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_deathweed.d: 當一隻大地魔像被殺時，有10%%機率啟動森林詛咒（森林中有100%%的機率）
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_steaming_ne: Golems summoned by Fire Golemancy will explode when killed
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_smoldering.de: Fire Golemancy will summon a Magma Golem which can split into two when killed
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_flame_trail.d: Fire Golemancy minions set the ground under them on fire
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_charcoal.name: Charcoal Ring
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_charcoal.desc: Fire Golemancy will summon two Furnace Golems. The Golems must be fed with coal to operate. Every additional fuel after the first one increases the golem's lifetime by 10 seconds
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_fire_golem_du: Your Fire Golems have twice as long lifetime
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_flame_golem.d: Fire Golemancy will summon a Flame Golem\nFlame Golems wield powerful fire magic and they can imbue their owner's weapon with fire
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_fire_goleman: Being near a Fire Golem while holding a Fire Staff will empower the caster's magic
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_ifrit_bottle: Your Fire Golems gain a Fireskin effect. Being near a Fire Golem while holding a Fire Staff will grant you fire resistance
spell.wizardrygolems\\:earth_golemancy.d: 在土壤中注入生命能量形成魔像
spell.wizardrygolems\\:earth_golemancy.l: 只有大師級大地魔杖才能召喚黑曜石魔像
spell.wizardrygolems\\:fire_golemancy.de: Draw power from the essence of Fire to create golems.
spell.wizardrygolems\\:fire_golemancy.lo: Only a Master tier Fire Wand can summon a Flame Golem
